comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: James Martinus Schoonmaker (1842-1927), Civil War veteran, vice-president of the Pittsburgh and Lake Erie Railway Company, on the board of directors at Mellon Bank; husband of Rachel Cook, father of three (Gretchen, William, and JM Jr.): profilesintime.blogspot.com/2007/03/james-martinus-schoon...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca for the information about the career of James Schoonmaker.  He even had a cargo ship named after him!  We'll fill in the title information next time we update the record.

comment._content: Wystan: Thanks for spotting the date on the negative.  We can add that information to the description, too, when we update it.  Nice to connect it up with the biography!
